reviewText: these didn't work at all! we tried it on several devices and it refused to start! so upset since this was a gift for my dad while he was recovering  the hospital/at home from major surgery. never ordering from these guys again!

This movie is hilarious and I loved it (from a previous viewing with English subs)...but I wish the seller would have specified whether or not the DVD had subtitles...it does NOT.
The movie itself gets 5 stars...the seller is the reason it's only 3.
